subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Ken Griffey Jr. hit his second three-run homer in as many games and drove in four runs to lead the Cincinnati Reds to a 7-3 victory against the visiting Milwaukee Brewers.
snippet: Ken Griffey Jr. hit his second three-run homer in as many games and drove in four runs to lead the Cincinnati Reds to a 7-3 victory against the visiting Milwaukee Brewers.
